typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		card_id as string,
		member_id as string,
		amount as string,
		postcode as string,
		pos_id as string,
		transaction_dt as string,
		status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	enableCdc: true,
	mode: 'read',
	multiLineRow: true) ~> source1
source(output(
		card_id as string,
		member_id as string,
		amount as string,
		postcode as string,
		pos_id as string,
		transaction_dt as string,
		status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	multiLineRow: true) ~> source2
source(output(
		id as short,
		{ name } as string,
		{ country} as string,
		{ gender} as string,
		{ dep_id} as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source3
source1, source2 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 split(equals(postcode, '33946'),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(postcode33946, other)
source2 derive(each(match(type=='string'), $$ = add( amount, '1000'))) ~> DerivedColumn2
ConditionalSplit1@postcode33946 select(mapColumn(
		card_id,
		member_id,
		amount,
		postcode,
		pos_id,
		transaction_dt,
		status
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		userId as integer,
		id as string,
		title as string,
		completed as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> source1
source(output(
		userId as integer,
		id as string,
		title as string,
		completed as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	httpMethod: 'GET',
	timeout: 30,
	requestInterval: 0,
	queryParameters: ['parm' -> ''],
	paginationRules: ['supportRFC5988' -> 'true'],
	responseFormat: ['type' -> 'json', 'documentForm' -> 'arrayOfDocuments']) ~> source3
source3 call(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	store: 'restservice',
	format: 'rest',
	timeout: 30,
	requestInterval: 0,
	httpMethod: 'GET',
	requestFormat: ['type' -> 'json'],
	responseFormat: ['type' -> 'json', 'documentForm' -> 'singleDocument']) ~> ExternalCall1
source2 filter(isNull(id)) ~> Filter1
Filter1 union(byName: true)~> Union1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		id as string,
		name as string,
		{ city} as string,
		{ age } as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		id as string,
		name as string,
		city as string,
		age as string,
		last_modified_date as date,
		hash as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1 derive(hash = md5(id+name+{ city}+{ age } ),
		modified_date = currentDate()) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, source2 lookup(source1@id == source2@id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(source2@id),
	isNull( source2@id) && notEquals(source2@hash, DerivedColumn1@hash),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(new, update, noupdates)
ConditionalSplit1@update alterRow(upsertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
ConditionalSplit1@new sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		id as string,
		name as string,
		city as string,
		age as string,
		last_modified_date as date,
		hash as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		id = ConditionalSplit1@new@id,
		name = ConditionalSplit1@new@name,
		city,
		age,
		last_modified_date,
		hash = ConditionalSplit1@new@hash
	)) ~> sink1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		id as string,
		name as string,
		city as string,
		age as string,
		last_modified_date as date,
		hash as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		id = ConditionalSplit1@update@id,
		name = ConditionalSplit1@update@name,
		city = { city},
		age = { age },
		last_modified_date,
		hash = ConditionalSplit1@update@hash
	)) ~> sink2

source(output(
		id as string,
		type as string,
		name as string,
		ppu as double,
		batters as (batter as (id as string, type as string)[]),
		topping as (id as string, type as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> source1
source1 parse(json_data_column_parsed = id ? (id as string,
		type as string,
		name as string,
		ppu as float,
		topping as (id as string, type as string)[],
		batters as string),
	format: 'json',
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> Parse1
Parse1 foldDown(unroll(topping),
	mapColumn(
		id,
		type,
		name,
		ppu,
		batters,
		topping,
		json_data_column_parsed
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 parse(topping = topping ? (id as string,
		type as string),
		batters = batters ? (batter as string[]),
	format: 'json',
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> Parse2
source1 foldDown(unroll(topping),
	mapColumn(
		id,
		type,
		name,
		ppu,
		batters,
		topping_id = topping.id,
		topping_type = topping.type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Flatten2
Flatten2 foldDown(unroll(batters.batter),
	mapColumn(
		id,
		type,
		name,
		ppu,
		batters_id = batters.batter.id,
		batter_type = batters.batter.type,
		topping_id,
		topping_type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten3
Flatten3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		id as string,
		{ name } as string,
		{ country} as string,
		{ gender} as string,
		{ dep_id} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		id as string,
		{ name } as string,
		{ country} as string,
		{ gender} as string,
		{ dep_id} as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['gender[n].csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 3,
		{ gender}
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		id as short,
		{ name } as string,
		{ country} as string,
		{ gender} as string,
		{ dep_id} as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		id as short,
		{ name } as string,
		{ country} as string,
		{ gender} as string,
		{ dep_id} as short,
		{ a} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1 pivot(groupBy({ dep_id}),
	pivotBy({ gender}),
	{gender-} = count((id)),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: false) ~> Pivot1
source2 select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		address as string,
		cat as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		emp_id as string,
		{ emp_name} as string,
		{ date_of_birth} as string,
		{ salary} as string,
		{ address} as string,
		{ grade} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 alterRow(upsertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow2
AlterRow2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['emp_id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		emp_id,
		{ emp_name},
		{ date_of_birth},
		{ salary},
		{ address},
		{ grade}
	)) ~> sink2

source(output(
		emp_id as integer,
		{ emp_name} as string,
		{ date_of_birth} as string,
		{ salary} as integer,
		{ address} as string,
		{ grade} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		sk as integer,
		emp_id as integer,
		emp_name as string,
		date_of_birth as string,
		salary as integer,
		address as string,
		grade as string,
		flag as integer,
		insert_datetime as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1 derive(flag = 1,
		insert_datetime = currentDate()) ~> DerivedColumn1
source2 select(mapColumn(
		dbsk = sk,
		dbemp_id = emp_id,
		dbemp_name = emp_name,
		dbdate_of_birth = date_of_birth,
		dbsalary = salary,
		dbaddress = address,
		dbgrade = address,
		dbflag = flag,
		dbinsert_datetime = insert_datetime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
source1, Select1 lookup(emp_id == dbemp_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup2
Lookup2 filter(!isNull(dbemp_id)) ~> Filter1
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		dbsk,
		dbemp_id,
		dbemp_name,
		dbdate_of_birth,
		dbsalary,
		dbaddress,
		dbflag,
		dbinsert_datetime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 derive(dbflag = 0) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['sk'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 0,
	mapColumn(
		sk = dbsk,
		emp_id = dbemp_id,
		emp_name = dbemp_name,
		date_of_birth = dbdate_of_birth,
		salary = dbsalary,
		address = dbaddress,
		flag = dbflag,
		insert_datetime = dbinsert_datetime
	)) ~> sink2
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		emp_id,
		{ emp_name},
		{ date_of_birth},
		{ salary},
		{ address},
		{ grade},
		flag,
		insert_datetime
	)) ~> sink3
